pkgmetadata.longdescription: Temporal Sensory Data Analysis // Analysis and visualization of data from temporal sensory methods, including for temporal check-all-that-apply (TCATA) and temporal dominance of sensations (TDS). Methods are mainly from manuscripts by Castura, J.C., Antnez, L., Gimnez, A., and Ares, G. (2016) doi:10.1016/j.foodqual.2015.06.017, Castura, Baker, and Ross (2016) doi:10.1016/j.foodqual.2016.06.011, and Pineau et al. (2009) doi:10.1016/j.foodqual.2009.04.005.
